== Overview ==

In order to deliver OpenStack point releases to Ubuntu users of OpenStack, the following SRU cadence will be followed to ensure that minor point releases are released into updates for the Ubuntu distribution and the Ubuntu Cloud Archive for 12.04 within two weeks of upstream release.
